tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** * * *********** ** *** *** ** *** **** *** ****** ******* *** **** *********** ******** I did a lot of research and then admitted my father-in-law for the unilateral knee replacement under Dr RDC . The kind of service that Narayana Health provides is really very good with great surgeons. My Father-in-law was fit to walk within 4 days..

Very much friendly & explained each & every aspect of the ailments and it's recovery*  * ***** *** ** *** **** ****** ** **** *********** ******* * recommends all to check up him, if anyone suffered from knee problems.

** ****** ********** I visited for worsening neck pain, radiating pain to arm. He said there must be nerve bulging issue if we do further tests, and I will get tensed by seeing the results.. instead just do physio .. I was extremely disappointed with such an experienced doctor ****** ********** **** ******* *** *** ******* ** ******** ********. 
I would not recommend him for cervical treatment atleast..

Not a great listner.
Super arrogant. Had chest cartilege injury, while i was clearly showing him how the problem started and the pain points, he was in too much hurry to listen. Suggeated some physio, problem is, for sternum/cartulege injury exercise in early stage makes problem worse.At one point he shouted on me for asking detailed questions and taking his time. Needless to say, his misdiagnosis costed me a lot of pain and time.
The doctor is very experienced and well spoken. My father is patient of aplastIc anemia and he explained really well if we should take further step or not
Doctor was very senior *** ****** ** *** ****** He examined my ankle thoroughly and suggested food and exercise apart from medicine.
Always in a hurry. No patience to listen. Doesn't give even 7-8 minutes time to listen and answer doubts or queries. However, he is a soft spoken gentleman.
Good reception, quck analysis and good advice  on the Diet and course of actions for long term .overall it was nice experience
Saw us on time, *** ********* ***** Though he needs to communicate better- both listen and talk. And also examine comprehensively
Bunch of mismanaged lot.no point in taking an appointment when we have to wait for such a long time.
